events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection late yesterday evening.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the customer's vehicle in a collision.
An agent was assigned to the case to initiate communication and manage the necessary procedures.
The claim was acknowledged and the customer was informed that the investigation process would start shortly.
We requested photos of the damage, the police report, and the vehicle registration documents for further assessment.
The customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photographs and the official police report.
An investigation was started to verify the incident details and to assess the extent of the damage sustained by the vehicle.
The investigation concluded that the collision was caused by a third party and the damages are covered under the policy.
We proposed a settlement amount covering repair costs and temporary transportation expenses for the customer.
The customer provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the timely response and proposed settlement.
The claim was officially approved after ensuring all requirements were met and terms were verified with the customer.
Payment was issued to the customer to cover the vehicle repairs and additional incurred expenses promptly.
The claim was closed successfully, with the customer confirming that repairs were completed to satisfaction.
All claim documents and the case files were archived securely for future reference and audit purposes.
